Makes a status_code and status_message node from indata as children to out.

Parameters:
out Where to put the nodes.
reply The document to make the nodes in.
indentLevel The indent to use.
indent If to use indent.
code String with the code of the status.
message String with the message of the status.
extendedCode String with the extended error code, default NULL and not appended if so.
uri String with the status URI, default NULL and not appended if so.
